mapper.select: select * from owner order by owner_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into owner(owner_id, user_id, password, user_name, shopname,email_id, email_server) values(seq_owner.nextval, #{user_id}, #{password}, #{shopname}, #{user_name}, #{email_id}, #{email_server})

mapper.delete: delete from owner where owner_id = #{owner_id} and user_id =#{user_id}
